data.actual_result: The overlay covers up the chat messages. (This may take a few tries to get)
data.expected_result: The overlay pushes up chat like it does on larger resolutions
data.short_description: When the text window in the overlay is at or near the default size, it covers up text on newlines
data.steps_to_repro: - Completely restart the overlay to ensure the overlay size is at its default - Go to any channel, preferably one without any attachments in it - Send enough messages so the chat reaches the bottom of the overlay or resize the overlay vertically so messages are right above the text bar - Insert a bunch of newlines into the text box
